testcase.name: Upload PO files and validate PO Details
testcase.system-out: Given Select "JC Penney" from Client drop...................................passed Then Click on Admin Module..................................................passed Then Click on New File Upload...............................................passed And Upload the file "E:\Automation\coreUI\FileUploads\L_O_LNS_PO.A877CB7D.A015A041.xml".passed Then Verify success message "L_O_LNS_PO.A877CB7D.A015A041.xml File is uploaded successfully".passed Then Click on Upload File List available on the side bar....................passed And Select "PO" from File Type drop down....................................passed And Enter File Name "L_O_LNS_PO.A877CB7D.A015A041.xml"......................passed Then Click on Search........................................................passed And Verify the status "Completed.." of the uploaded file "L_O_LNS_PO.A877CB7D.A015A041.xml".passed Then Click on BaseData......................................................passed And Search for the Number "SS7513355".......................................passed Then Verify the PO Details in the Result grid "SS7513355"...................passed
